name: Kardi Somerfield
role: Senior Lecturer in Digital Marketing at University of Northampton, and Owner / Illustrator FridgeStreet
bio: Dr. Kardi Somerfield is an educator, researcher, and business owner, known for her innovative approach to bridging theory and practice. She currently leads the MSc Digital Marketing at The University of Northampton and is currently working on projects exploring the application of artificial intelligence and virtual reality.
